Make Calls for Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

Learn How to Make CallsView the Calling Script
The dialer for Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez closes at 9:00PM ET. It re-opens in the morning at 10 AM ET. Sign Up for a Call Shift!

1 Claim Your Login

2 Log into the dialer and call

Questions

Please email us@ocasio2018.com , or call (845) 605-2742.

Calling Hours

We make calls from 10AM - 9PM on Monday through Saturday and 12PM - 9PM on Sundays local time in New York, so check back anytime you want to make calls.

However, your login information will change each day, so you'll need to reclaim it.
